alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN BAYFIELD, SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS, IRON, NORTHEASTERN WASHBURN, ASHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Saxon, to near Mellen, to 9 miles northwest of Seeley, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mellen around 825 PM CDT. Hurley and Gile around 830 PM CDT. Ironwood and Cable around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Glidden, Little Round Lake and Round Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Sawyer; Washburn
